slides.title: Step 01 - Mandate Identification
slides.description: Institutional and commercial opportunities are screened for structural suitability, regulatory viability, and stakeholder alignment.

slides.title: Step 02 - Supplier & Partner Structuring
slides.description: International suppliers and local operators are evaluated for capability, compliance alignment, and enforceable participation within structured frameworks.

slides.title: Step 03 - Contract Framework Design
slides.description: Multi-jurisdiction commercial frameworks are structured with defined scope, performance expectations, risk allocation, and governance boundaries.

slides.title: Step 04 - Independent Operator Engagement
slides.description: Where local execution is required, independent operating partners are engaged under mandate-specific authorization. PAG does not substitute execution accountability but supports structural coordination.

slides.title: Step 05 - Governance-Bounded Oversight
slides.description: PAG maintains oversight within its defined contractual perimeter while designated operators manage delivery responsibilities.
